verses.roman:
caudda-bhuvane yāṅra sabe kare dhyāna
vaikuṇṭhādi-pure yāṅra līlā-guṇa gāna

synonyms: caudda-bhuvane—within the fourteen worlds; yāṅra—of whom; sabe—all; kare dhyāna—perform meditation; vaikuṇṭha-ādi-pure—in the abodes of the Vaikuṇṭha planets; yāṅra—of whom; līlā-guṇa—attributes and pastimes; gāna—chanting.
translation: Everyone in the fourteen worlds meditates upon Him, and all the denizens of Vaikuṇṭha sing of His qualities and pastimes.
